name: CV Cristopher Galarce Product Designer
description:
Over 5 years working in UX. I am a UX/UI Designer made for agile teams. I work with an obsessive Passion-Driven mindset to provide desirable products for users and business. I work with multidisciplinary teams in Ecommerce B2B-B2C, Finance and Insurance projects. BA in Graphic Design.
